title: YaYaYa
lyrics:
Come hold me down, I've gone too far
These heavy words, your open heart
Somebody, hold my head up
Somebody, hold my head up

Ayayayaya, ayayayaya

Is the world we safe getting in our ways?

Ayayayaya, ayayayaya

Is the world we make hidden in our ways?

(Ayayayaya)



Come hold my breath and cross my heart

I won't come back and steal your guard



Somebody, hold my head up

Somebody, hold my head up



Ayayayaya, ayayayaya

Is the world we safe getting in our ways?

Ayayayaya, ayayayaya

Is the world we make hidden in our ways?

Ooh (Ayayayaya)



(Ayayayaya, ayayayaya)

(Ayayayaya, ayayayaya)

(Ayayayaya, ayayayaya)

(Ayayayaya, ayayayaya)

(Ayayayaya, ayayayaya)

(Ayayayaya, ayayayaya)

(Ayayayaya, ayayayaya)

(Ayayayaya, ayayayaya)
